register.name: ACTLR
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED configuration and control options for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: S_ACTLR
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED configuration and control options for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: N_ACTLR
register.description: Provides IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED configuration and control options for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: ACTLR2
register.description: Provides additional space to the ACTLR register to hold IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED trap functionality for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: S_ACTLR2
register.description: Provides additional space to the ACTLR register to hold IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED trap functionality for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: N_ACTLR2
register.description: Provides additional space to the ACTLR register to hold IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED trap functionality for execution at EL1 and EL0.

register.name: CPACR
register.description: Controls access to trace, and to Advanced SIMD and floating-point functionality from EL0, EL1, and EL3...

bitField.name: ASEDIS
bitField.description: Disables PL0 and PL1 execution of Advanced SIMD instructions.

bitField.name: TRCDIS
bitField.description: Traps PL0 and PL1 System register accesses to all implemented trace registers to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: cp11
bitField.description: The value of this field is ignored. If this field is programmed with a different value to the cp10 field then this field is UNKNOWN on a direct read of the CPACR.

bitField.name: cp10
bitField.description: Defines the access rights for the floating-point and Advanced SIMD functionality.

register.name: HACTLR
register.description: Controls IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED features of Hyp mode operation.

register.name: HACTLR2
register.description: Provides additional space to the HACTLR register to hold IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED trap functionality.

register.name: HSCTLR
register.description: Provides top level control of the system operation in Hyp mode.

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: T32 Exception Enable.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: The value of the PSTATE.E bit on entry to Hyp mode, the endianness of stage 1 translation table walks in the EL2 translation regime, and the endianness of stage 2 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: WXN
bitField.description: Write permission implies XN (Execute-never). For the EL2 translation regime, this bit can force all memory regions that are writable to be treated as XN.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Instruction access Cacheability control, for accesses at EL2:

bitField.name: SED
bitField.description: SETEND instruction disable. Disables SETEND instructions at EL2.

bitField.name: ITD
bitField.description: IT Disable. Disables some uses of IT instructions at EL2.

bitField.name: CP15BEN
bitField.description: System instruction memory barrier enable.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cacheability control, for data accesses at EL2:

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Alignment check enable.

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable for EL2 stage 1 address translation.

register.name: SCTLR
register.description: Provides the top level control of the system, including its memory system.

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: T32 Exception Enable.

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: Access Flag Enable. When using the Short-descriptor translation table format for the PL1&0 translation regime, this bit enables use of the AP[0] bit in the translation descriptors as the Access flag, and restricts access permissions in the translation descriptors to the simplified model.

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: TEX remap enable. This bit enables remapping of the TEX[2:1] bits in the PL1&0 translation regime for use as two translation table bits that can be managed by the operating system. Enabling this remapping also changes the scheme used to describe the memory region attributes in the VMSA.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: The value of the PSTATE.E bit on branch to an exception vector or coming out of reset, and the endianness of stage 1 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: UWXN
bitField.description: Unprivileged write permission implies PL1 XN (Execute-never). This bit can force all memory regions that are writable at PL0 to be treated as XN for accesses from software executing at PL1.

bitField.name: WXN
bitField.description: Write permission implies XN (Execute-never). For the PL1&0 translation regime, this bit can force all memory regions that are writable to be treated as XN.

bitField.name: nTWE
bitField.description: Traps EL0 execution of WFE instructions to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: nTWI
bitField.description: Traps EL0 execution of WFI instructions to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Vectors bit.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Instruction access Cacheability control, for accesses at EL1 and EL0:

bitField.name: SED
bitField.description: SETEND instruction disable. Disables SETEND instructions at PL0 and PL1.

bitField.name: ITD
bitField.description: IT Disable. Disables some uses of IT instructions at PL1 and PL0.

bitField.name: UNK
bitField.description: Writes to this bit are IGNORED. Reads of this bit return an UNKNOWN value.

bitField.name: CP15BEN
bitField.description: System instruction memory barrier enable.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cacheability control, for data accesses at EL1 and EL0:

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Alignment check enable.

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable for EL1 and EL0 stage 1 address translation.

register.name: S_SCTLR
register.description: Provides the top level control of the system, including its memory system.

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: T32 Exception Enable.

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: Access Flag Enable. When using the Short-descriptor translation table format for the PL1&0 translation regime, this bit enables use of the AP[0] bit in the translation descriptors as the Access flag, and restricts access permissions in the translation descriptors to the simplified model.

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: TEX remap enable. This bit enables remapping of the TEX[2:1] bits in the PL1&0 translation regime for use as two translation table bits that can be managed by the operating system. Enabling this remapping also changes the scheme used to describe the memory region attributes in the VMSA.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: The value of the PSTATE.E bit on branch to an exception vector or coming out of reset, and the endianness of stage 1 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: UWXN
bitField.description: Unprivileged write permission implies PL1 XN (Execute-never). This bit can force all memory regions that are writable at PL0 to be treated as XN for accesses from software executing at PL1.

bitField.name: WXN
bitField.description: Write permission implies XN (Execute-never). For the PL1&0 translation regime, this bit can force all memory regions that are writable to be treated as XN.

bitField.name: nTWE
bitField.description: Traps EL0 execution of WFE instructions to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: nTWI
bitField.description: Traps EL0 execution of WFI instructions to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Vectors bit.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Instruction access Cacheability control, for accesses at EL1 and EL0:

bitField.name: SED
bitField.description: SETEND instruction disable. Disables SETEND instructions at PL0 and PL1.

bitField.name: ITD
bitField.description: IT Disable. Disables some uses of IT instructions at PL1 and PL0.

bitField.name: UNK
bitField.description: Writes to this bit are IGNORED. Reads of this bit return an UNKNOWN value.

bitField.name: CP15BEN
bitField.description: System instruction memory barrier enable.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cacheability control, for data accesses at EL1 and EL0:

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Alignment check enable.

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable for EL1 and EL0 stage 1 address translation.

register.name: N_SCTLR
register.description: Provides the top level control of the system, including its memory system.

bitField.name: TE
bitField.description: T32 Exception Enable.

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: Access Flag Enable. When using the Short-descriptor translation table format for the PL1&0 translation regime, this bit enables use of the AP[0] bit in the translation descriptors as the Access flag, and restricts access permissions in the translation descriptors to the simplified model.

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: TEX remap enable. This bit enables remapping of the TEX[2:1] bits in the PL1&0 translation regime for use as two translation table bits that can be managed by the operating system. Enabling this remapping also changes the scheme used to describe the memory region attributes in the VMSA.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: The value of the PSTATE.E bit on branch to an exception vector or coming out of reset, and the endianness of stage 1 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime.

bitField.name: UWXN
bitField.description: Unprivileged write permission implies PL1 XN (Execute-never). This bit can force all memory regions that are writable at PL0 to be treated as XN for accesses from software executing at PL1.

bitField.name: WXN
bitField.description: Write permission implies XN (Execute-never). For the PL1&0 translation regime, this bit can force all memory regions that are writable to be treated as XN.

bitField.name: nTWE
bitField.description: Traps EL0 execution of WFE instructions to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: nTWI
bitField.description: Traps EL0 execution of WFI instructions to Undefined mode.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Vectors bit.

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Instruction access Cacheability control, for accesses at EL1 and EL0:

bitField.name: SED
bitField.description: SETEND instruction disable. Disables SETEND instructions at PL0 and PL1.

bitField.name: ITD
bitField.description: IT Disable. Disables some uses of IT instructions at PL1 and PL0.

bitField.name: UNK
bitField.description: Writes to this bit are IGNORED. Reads of this bit return an UNKNOWN value.

bitField.name: CP15BEN
bitField.description: System instruction memory barrier enable.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cacheability control, for data accesses at EL1 and EL0:

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Alignment check enable.

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable for EL1 and EL0 stage 1 address translation.

tcf:enumItem.description: This control permits execution of Advanced SIMD instructions at PL0 and PL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_permits_execution_of_Advanced_SIMD_instructions_at_PL0_and_PL1

tcf:enumItem.description: All instruction encodings that are Advanced SIMD instruction encodings, but are not also floating-point instruction encodings, are UNDEFINED at PL0 and PL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_instruction_encodings_that_are_Advanced_SIMD_instruction_encodings_but_are_not_also_floating_point_instruction_encodings_are_UNDEFINED_at_PL0_and_PL1

tcf:enumItem.description: This control has no effect on PL0 and PL1 System register accesses to trace registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_has_no_effect_on_PL0_and_PL1_System_register_accesses_to_trace_registers

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 and PL1 System register accesses to all implemented trace registers are trapped to Undefined mode.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_and_PL1_System_register_accesses_to_all_implemented_trace_registers_are_trapped_to_Undefined_mode

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 and PL1 accesses to floating-point and Advanced SIMD registers or instructions are UNDEFINED.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_and_PL1_accesses_to_floating_point_and_Advanced_SIMD_registers_or_instructions_are_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 accesses to floating-point and Advanced SIMD registers or instructions are UNDEFINED.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_accesses_to_floating_point_and_Advanced_SIMD_registers_or_instructions_are_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: Reserved. The effect of programming this field to this value is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE. See .
tcf:enumItem.name: Reserved

tcf:enumItem.description: This control permits full access to the floating-point and Advanced SIMD functionality from PL0 and PL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_permits_full_access_to_the_floating_point_and_Advanced_SIMD_functionality_from_PL0_and_PL1

tcf:enumItem.description: Exceptions, including reset, taken to A32 state.
tcf:enumItem.name: Exceptions_including_reset_taken_to_A32_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Exceptions, including reset, taken to T32 state.
tcf:enumItem.name: Exceptions_including_reset_taken_to_T32_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Little-endian. PSTATE.E is cleared to 0 on entry to Hyp mode. Stage 1 translation table walks in the EL2 translation regime, and stage 2 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime are little-endian.
tcf:enumItem.name: Little_endian

tcf:enumItem.description: Big-endian. PSTATE.E is set to 1 on entry to Hyp mode. Stage 1 translation table walks in the EL2 translation regime, and stage 2 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime are big-endian.
tcf:enumItem.name: Big_endian

tcf:enumItem.description: This control has no effect on memory access permissions.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_has_no_effect_on_memory_access_permissions

tcf:enumItem.description: Any region that is writable in the EL2 translation regime is forced to XN for accesses from software executing at EL2.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_region_that_is_writable_in_the_EL2_translation_regime_is_forced_to_XN_for_accesses_from_software_executing_at_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: All instruction access to Normal memory from EL2 are Non-cacheable for all levels of instruction and unified cache...
tcf:enumItem.name: All_instruction_access_to_Normal_memory_from_EL2_are_Non_cacheable_for_all_levels_of_instruction_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: All instruction access to Normal memory from EL2 can be cached at all levels of instruction and unified cache...
tcf:enumItem.name: All_instruction_access_to_Normal_memory_from_EL2_can_be_cached_at_all_levels_of_instruction_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: SETEND instruction execution is enabled at EL2.
tcf:enumItem.name: SETEND_instruction_execution_is_enabled_at_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: SETEND instructions are UNDEFINED at EL2.
tcf:enumItem.name: SETEND_instructions_are_UNDEFINED_at_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: All IT instruction functionality is enabled at EL2.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_IT_instruction_functionality_is_enabled_at_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: Any attempt at EL2 to execute any of the following is UNDEFINED...
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_attempt_at_EL2_to_execute_any_of_the_following_is_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: EL2 execution of the CP15DMB, CP15DSB, and CP15ISB instructions is UNDEFINED.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL2_execution_of_the_CP15DMB_CP15DSB_and_CP15ISB_instructions_is_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: EL2 execution of the CP15DMB, CP15DSB, and CP15ISB instructions is enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL2_execution_of_the_CP15DMB_CP15DSB_and_CP15ISB_instructions_is_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: All data access to Normal memory from EL2, and all accesses to the EL2 translation tables, are Non-cacheable for all levels of data and unified cache.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_data_access_to_Normal_memory_from_EL2_and_all_accesses_to_the_EL2_translation_tables_are_Non_cacheable_for_all_levels_of_data_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: All data access to Normal memory from EL2, and all accesses to the EL2 translation tables, can be cached at all levels of data and unified cache.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_data_access_to_Normal_memory_from_EL2_and_all_accesses_to_the_EL2_translation_tables_can_be_cached_at_all_levels_of_data_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: Alignment fault checking disabled when executing at EL2...
tcf:enumItem.name: Alignment_fault_checking_disabled_when_executing_at_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: Alignment fault checking enabled when executing at EL2...
tcf:enumItem.name: Alignment_fault_checking_enabled_when_executing_at_EL2

tcf:enumItem.description: EL2 stage 1 address translation disabled...
tcf:enumItem.name: EL2_stage_1_address_translation_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: EL2 stage 1 address translation enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL2_stage_1_address_translation_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Exceptions, including reset, taken to A32 state.
tcf:enumItem.name: Exceptions_including_reset_taken_to_A32_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Exceptions, including reset, taken to T32 state.
tcf:enumItem.name: Exceptions_including_reset_taken_to_T32_state

tcf:enumItem.description: In the translation table descriptors, AP[0] is an access permissions bit. The full range of access permissions is supported. No Access flag is implemented.
tcf:enumItem.name: In_the_translation_table_descriptors_AP_0_is_an_access_permissions_bit

tcf:enumItem.description: In the translation table descriptors, AP[0] is the Access flag. Only the simplified model for access permissions is supported.
tcf:enumItem.name: In_the_translation_table_descriptors_AP_0_is_the_Access_flag

tcf:enumItem.description: TEX remap disabled. TEX[2:0] are used, with the C and B bits, to describe the memory region attributes.
tcf:enumItem.name: TEX_remap_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: TEX remap enabled. TEX[2:1] are reassigned for use as bits managed by the operating system. The TEX[0], C, and B bits are used to describe the memory region attributes, with the MMU remap registers.
tcf:enumItem.name: TEX_remap_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Little-endian. PSTATE.E is cleared to 0 on taking an exception or coming out of reset. Stage 1 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime are little-endian.
tcf:enumItem.name: Little_endian

tcf:enumItem.description: Big-endian. PSTATE.E is cleared to 0 on taking an exception or coming out of reset. Stage 1 translation table walks in the PL1&0 translation regime are big-endian.
tcf:enumItem.name: Big_endian

tcf:enumItem.description: This control has no effect on memory access permissions.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_has_no_effect_on_memory_access_permissions

tcf:enumItem.description: Any region that is writable at PL0 forced to XN for accesses from software executing at PL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_region_that_is_writable_at_PL0_forced_to_XN_for_accesses_from_software_executing_at_PL1

tcf:enumItem.description: This control has no effect on memory access permissions.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_has_no_effect_on_memory_access_permissions

tcf:enumItem.description: Any region that is writable in the PL1&0 translation regime is forced to XN for accesses from software executing at PL1 or PL0.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_region_that_is_writable_in_the_PL1_0_translation_regime_is_forced_to_XN_for_accesses_from_software_executing_at_PL1_or_PL0

tcf:enumItem.description: Any attempt to execute a WFE instruction at EL0 is trapped to Undefined mode, if the instruction would otherwise have caused the PE to enter a low-power state.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_attempt_to_execute_a_WFE_instruction_at_EL0_is_trapped_to_Undefined_mode_if_the_instruction_would_otherwise_have_caused_the_PE_to_enter_a_low_power_state

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: Any attempt to execute a WFI instruction at EL0 is trapped to Undefined mode, if the instruction would otherwise have caused the PE to enter a low-power state.
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_attempt_to_execute_a_WFI_instruction_at_EL0_is_trapped_to_Undefined_mode_if_the_instruction_would_otherwise_have_caused_the_PE_to_enter_a_low_power_state

tcf:enumItem.description: This control does not cause any instructions to be trapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: This_control_does_not_cause_any_instructions_to_be_trapped

tcf:enumItem.description: Normal exception vectors. Base address is held in VBAR.
tcf:enumItem.name: Normal_exception_vectors

tcf:enumItem.description: High exception vectors (Hivecs), base address 0xFFFF0000. This base address cannot be remapped.
tcf:enumItem.name: High_exception_vectors_Hivecs_base_address_0xFFFF0000

tcf:enumItem.description: All instruction access to Normal memory from PL1 and PL0 are Non-cacheable for all levels of instruction and unified cache...
tcf:enumItem.name: All_instruction_access_to_Normal_memory_from_PL1_and_PL0_are_Non_cacheable_for_all_levels_of_instruction_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: All instruction access to Normal memory from PL1 and PL0 can be cached at all levels of instruction and unified cache...
tcf:enumItem.name: All_instruction_access_to_Normal_memory_from_PL1_and_PL0_can_be_cached_at_all_levels_of_instruction_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: SETEND instruction execution is enabled at PL0 and PL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: SETEND_instruction_execution_is_enabled_at_PL0_and_PL1

tcf:enumItem.description: SETEND instructions are UNDEFINED at PL0 and PL1.
tcf:enumItem.name: SETEND_instructions_are_UNDEFINED_at_PL0_and_PL1

tcf:enumItem.description: All IT instruction functionality is enabled at PL1 and PL0.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_IT_instruction_functionality_is_enabled_at_PL1_and_PL0

tcf:enumItem.description: Any attempt at PL1 or PL0 to execute any of the following is UNDEFINED...
tcf:enumItem.name: Any_attempt_at_PL1_or_PL0_to_execute_any_of_the_following_is_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 and PL1 execution of the CP15DMB, CP15DSB, and CP15ISB instructions is UNDEFINED.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_and_PL1_execution_of_the_CP15DMB_CP15DSB_and_CP15ISB_instructions_is_UNDEFINED

tcf:enumItem.description: PL0 and PL1 execution of the CP15DMB, CP15DSB, and CP15ISB instructions is enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: PL0_and_PL1_execution_of_the_CP15DMB_CP15DSB_and_CP15ISB_instructions_is_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: All data access to Normal memory from PL1 and PL0, and all accesses to the PL1&0 stage 1 translation tables, are Non-cacheable for all levels of data and unified cache.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_data_access_to_Normal_memory_from_PL1_and_PL0_and_all_accesses_to_the_PL1_0_stage_1_translation_tables_are_Non_cacheable_for_all_levels_of_data_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: All data access to Normal memory from PL1 and PL0, and all accesses to the PL1&0 stage 1 translation tables, can be cached at all levels of data and unified cache.
tcf:enumItem.name: All_data_access_to_Normal_memory_from_PL1_and_PL0_and_all_accesses_to_the_PL1_0_stage_1_translation_tables_can_be_cached_at_all_levels_of_data_and_unified_cache

tcf:enumItem.description: Alignment fault checking disabled when executing at PL1 or PL0...
tcf:enumItem.name: Alignment_fault_checking_disabled_when_executing_at_PL1_or_PL0

tcf:enumItem.description: Alignment fault checking enabled when executing at PL1 or PL0...
tcf:enumItem.name: Alignment_fault_checking_enabled_when_executing_at_PL1_or_PL0

tcf:enumItem.description: EL1 and EL0 stage 1 address translation disabled...
tcf:enumItem.name: EL1_and_EL0_stage_1_address_translation_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: EL1 and EL0 stage 1 address translation enabled.
tcf:enumItem.name: EL1_and_EL0_stage_1_address_translation_enabled
